--- select_tablesample_with_subquery.sql
SELECT
  *
FROM
  (SELECT * FROM Singers) TABLESAMPLE BERNOULLI (90 PERCENT)

--- AST
&ast.QueryStatement{
  Hint:  (*ast.Hint)(nil),
  Query: &ast.Select{
    Select:   0,
    Distinct: false,
    As:       nil,
    Results:  []ast.SelectItem{
      &ast.Star{
        Star: 9,
      },
    },
    From: &ast.From{
      From:   11,
      Source: &ast.SubQueryTableExpr{
        Lparen: 18,
        Rparen: 40,
        Query:  &ast.Select{
          Select:   19,
          Distinct: false,
          As:       nil,
          Results:  []ast.SelectItem{
            &ast.Star{
              Star: 26,
            },
          },
          From: &ast.From{
            From:   28,
            Source: &ast.TableName{
              Table: &ast.Ident{
                NamePos: 33,
                NameEnd: 40,
                Name:    "Singers",
              },
              Hint:   (*ast.Hint)(nil),
              As:     (*ast.AsAlias)(nil),
              Sample: (*ast.TableSample)(nil),
            },
          },
          Where:   (*ast.Where)(nil),
          GroupBy: (*ast.GroupBy)(nil),
          Having:  (*ast.Having)(nil),
        },
        As:     (*ast.AsAlias)(nil),
        Sample: &ast.TableSample{
          TableSample: 42,
          Method:      "BERNOULLI",
          Size:        &ast.TableSampleSize{
            Lparen: 64,
            Rparen: 75,
            Value:  &ast.IntLiteral{
              ValuePos: 65,
              ValueEnd: 67,
              Base:     10,
              Value:    "90",
            },
            Unit: "PERCENT",
          },
        },
      },
    },
    Where:   (*ast.Where)(nil),
    GroupBy: (*ast.GroupBy)(nil),
    Having:  (*ast.Having)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM Singers) TABLESAMPLE BERNOULLI (90 PERCENT)
